briefDescription: THERE ARE 55% LITERACY IN THE SATPUDA OF AKRANI PEOPLE.MALNUTRITION IS ANOTHER BIG PROBLEM OF AKRANI TALUKA, GOVT.ALSO FAILED TO SOLVE THESE PROBLEMS.LACK OF JOBS 80% PEOPLE ARE MIGRATED FROM THIS AKRANI AND MANY PROBLEMS COME OUT DUE TO ILLITERACY. AKRANI TALUKA IS HILLARY AREA THAT'S WHY, THERE ARE PROBLEM OF TRANSPORT AND COMMUNICATION.WE ARE TRYING TO SOLVE THEIR PROBLEMS OFFERING TRAINING AND PROGRAMS AMONG PEOPLE.OUR SOCIETY IS TRYING TO REMOVE THE VARIOUS PROBLEMS IN THE AREAS.WE ACT TRIBAL DEVELOPMENT SUCH AS EDUCATION FOR POOR AND ORPHAN CHILDREN,OLD AND BAD TRADITIONS AWARENESS AMONG TRIBAL VILLAGERS,TREE PLANTATIONS, HEALTH AWARENESS IN POOR AND SLUMS PEOPLE, AWARENESS OF MALNUTRITION IN TRIBAL PEOPLE,CLEANLINESS AWARENESS AMONG POOR PEOPLE,EDUCATION FOR MIGRATED CHILDREN,TRAINING PROGRAM FOR NEEDY AND POOR WOMEN SUCH AS CRAFT TRAINING ETC.CULTURE PRESERVATION IN VILLAGES,SCHOOL DROPPED STUDENTS MUST BE READMITTED , PERKS AMONG FARMERS PROVIDING ROJGAR,PRESERVE AND PROTECT ITS HERITAGE,COHESIVE PLANNING FOR GOOD VILLAGES, AND OTHER MANY PROGRAMS RELATED WITH TRIBAL PEOPLE AND URBAN PEOPLE.WE TRY TO COME OVER THEIR PROBLEMS OFFERING CULTURE ACTIVITIES IN EVERY VILLAGE.EVERY YEAR OUR SANSTHA GIVING EDUCATION AROUND 200 STUDENTS WITHOUT HELP OF GOVERNMENT.OUR SANSTHA CONDUCTING MANY SOCIAL ACTIVITIES IN THIS RURAL AREA SUCH AS FOOD AND CULTURE.
